summary:
SUMMARY
•	17+ years’ experience in wind industry with broad knowledge of wind blade manufacturing processes  
•	Knowledge of tooling and processing of  fiber reinforced composites
•	Technical support during validation of tools with respect to manufacturing process
•	Main and support tooling’s and process improvement projects
•	Deep-rooted Tooling knowledge from Design-to-Operation
•	Developed various tooling focusing on reduction of cycle time, waste and cost.
•	Thinking Out-of-the-Box and bringing innovations to the company

Core Competencies: 

•	Technology Development
•	Problem Resolution
•	Value Engineering
•	Team Building, Training & Leadership

education.degree_name: Bachelor of Science Degree in Engineering Technology

profile_positions.description:
•	Mould vacuum technology 
•	Carbon machining 
•	Analyzing rotor blade process design (PD) and production process engineering (PPD) in order to develop tooling prototyping and to determine the ability to manufacture new tooling equipment 
•	Building and  / coordinating testing facilities in Hengelo and CEC Baroda in order to test new tools / new mould concepts 
•	Acceptance inspection (FAT/SAT) 
•	Executive R&D lab work for small scale test for NPD
•	Providing local assistance and instructions to India team to support output and ensure quality standards are met 
•	Installs, modifies, upgrades and maintains tooling 
•	Initiating, participating in and leading tooling design reviews. 
•	Interfaces with tooling production in India to identify and monitor manufacturing issues in tooling
•	Making tooling related instructions and support to designers, constructors and suppliers in India and Hengelo
•	Actively follows and stays up-to-date with (new) developments in tooling related to wind industry.
profile_positions.title: Senior Tooling Engineer - R & D

profile_positions.description:
•	Responsibility for preparing work instructions & SOP based on the design/ process documents.
•	Streamlining of production activities for blade manufacturing & cycle time achieving. 
•	Coordinator for conducting process trials and authorized for initiating design change initiatives.
•	Responsible for stage GATE process closure during prototyping, ramp up and during hand over stage.
•	Ensure product drawings and process specifications validation of all the variants.
•	CFT member for cost reduction activities carried out across blade manufacturing units. 
•	Validation of old existing machineries (Sawing and drilling machine, resin & adhesive mixing machine, vacuum pumps, Eastman/Lectra – fiber glass cutting machine, rotor blade balancing machine, EOT cranes)
•	Conducting new trials and sharing feedback to R & D team for process improvement.  
•	Provide technical support on continuous improvement project,  cycle time reduction and cost reduction projects.
profile_positions.title: Senior Engineer - Manufacturing Engineering

profile_positions.description:
•	Providing training / SOP for Molding and Tooling maintenance activities. 
•	Project leaders for various key driving projects (handled 5 projects)
•	Conducting new trials and sharing feedback to R & D team for process improvement.  
•	Provide technical support on continuous improvement project,  cycle time reduction and cost reduction projects.
•	Various on job training provided to technicians for e.g. structural glass/core  layup, infusion process, product demoulding process, machine operation process and  finishing process. 
•	Team leader for main shell activity and  support function to  maintenance department for vacuum pumps.
profile_positions.title: Mechanical Engineer  - Mold Maintenance and Project Lead

profile_positions.description:
•	Manufacturing of models & moulds of various lengths for rotor blades, nose cones and nacelle cover of wind turbine generators with VARIM process (Vacuum Assisted Resin Infusion Molding) at MMU (Mould Manufacturing Unit).
•	Installation & commissioning of moulds,  prototyping rotor blades, production ramp up and support tooling for various production facility (India, China & USA)
•	Installation & Commissioning of Sawing & Drilling Machine at various production facilities(India & USA) and achieving design cycle time of sawing & drilling process as per R & D guidelines. 
•	Designated as a Project leader of developing new sawing and drilling machine project at MMU (Mould Manufacturing Unit).
•	Trouble shooting and coordinating with cross functional teams at different manufacturing facility (globally).
•	Work instruction/Training/ SOP for mould preventive maintenance and support tooling for rotor blade production facility.
profile_positions.title: Tooling Engineer - Mould Manufacturing

profile_positions.description:
•	Worked as a team leader for rotor blade- main shell area and Drilling & Sawing Machine Operator.
•	Team leader for main shell activity and  support function to  maintenance department for vacuum pumps .
•	Trouble shooting during production process and co-ordination with R & D Department (Blade technology center, The Netherlands). 
•	Sawing & drilling machine modification done on outsource overseas old machine as per requirement from 1400 PCD to 1600 PCD for extended rotor blades – STAR AWARD for Appreciation from Suzlon CMD. 
•	Underwent training for manufacturing rotor blade model & mould and to produce prototype blades at blade technology center - AE-Rotor technique, Hengelo – The Netherlands
profile_positions.title: Production Engineer (Rotor Blade Production)

profile_positions.description:
•	Supervises all construction-related work activities and assigned field functions and/or crafts involved within a discipline on the project.
•	Oversee the daily activities at work site, including scheduling of workers, delivery of equipment and materials, and progress of the project
•	High focus on ensuring that all aspects of the construction work is performed safely
•	Review incoming engineering drawings and assess impact of extra work or changes on schedule
profile_positions.title: Piping Supervisor

skills: 	Aggressive at identifying and resolving inefficient procedures and processes
	Exposed to working in different teams and various locations
	Adept at completing, demanding projects within crucial timelines
